title: Cannabis Strains Dataset
subtitle: Real cannabis strain listings scraped from Seed City website
description:
This dataset contains real cannabis strain listings scraped from the Seed City website (https://www.seed-city.com/en/list-all-products). It includes strain names, breeders, descriptions, prices in GBP, discount information, pack options, product URLs, and image URLs.

The data was collected using web scraping techniques and includes the following fields:
- strain_name: Name of the cannabis strain
- breeder: Name of the breeder/company
- description: Product description
- current_price_gbp: Current price in GBP
- original_price_gbp: Original price in GBP (if discounted)
- discount_percent: Discount percentage
- pack_options: Available pack sizes and prices
- product_url: Link to the product page
- image_url: Link to the product image

This dataset can be used for analysis of cannabis market trends, pricing, and product availability.

resources.description: Main dataset file containing all scraped cannabis strain data

acknowledgements: Data scraped from Seed City website. Please respect their terms of service and robots.txt when using this data.
